title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 680.10 - Approval to operate a hospital
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 680.10 - Approval to operate a hospital

State Regulations
A corporation which has received Public Health Council
establishment approval to operate as a central services facility rural health
network and seeks approval to establish and construct or aquire a hospital, or
seeks joint establishment approval to share operational authority with the
operator of a hospital in accordance with subdivision (c) of section
405.1
of this Title, shall comply
with the provisions of Parts 600 and 610 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
680.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
